Eiffel Tower.Description: A wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.
Eiffel Tower.Address: Champ de Mars, 5 Av. Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

Louvre Museum.Description: Housed in the Louvre Palace built by Philip II (Philip Augustus), the Louvre Museum is a world-renowned art museum that is located in Paris, France.

Palace of Versailles.Description: The Palace of Versailles is a former royal residence built by King Louis XIV.

Notre-Dame Cathedral.Description: A renowned architectural masterpiece symbolizing centuries of history and cultural significance.

Sainte-Chapelle.Description: A breathtaking masterpiece of Gothic architecture, it houses an exquisite collection of stained glass windows that tell biblical stories with unparalleled beauty.

Centre Pompidou.Description: The cultural landmark houses a vast collection of modern and contemporary art, serving as a hub for artistic expression and creative inspiration.

Ile Saint-Louis.Description: A historic island in the heart of Paris, known for its architectural charm and cultural significance.

Trocadero Gardens.Description: A historic landmark renowned for its architectural grandeur and panoramic views, serving as a symbol of cultural heritage and artistic appreciation.

Arc de Triomphe, Champs-Elysees.Description: A monumental triumphal arch, known for its grandeur and historical significance.

Grand Palais, Petit Palais.Description: An iconic architectural masterpiece known for its majestic glass dome and hosting a variety of prestigious events and exhibitions.

Parc Monceau.Description: A picturesque urban oasis with ornate architecture, lush greenery, and winding paths in the heart of the city.

Hall of Mirrors.Description: A stunning chamber adorned with reflective surfaces, creating an illusion of endless grandeur.

Gardens of Versailles.Description: A majestic and meticulously landscaped outdoor haven with ornate fountains, geometrically designed flowerbeds, and sprawling lawns surrounding a grand palace.

Grand Trianon, Petit Trianon.Description: A stunning architectural gem nestled within picturesque gardens, renowned for its elegance and regal charm.

Antoinette Estate.Description: A grand historical estate in Paris, associated with a prominent figure from the past.
